title: Ziba, the Last Warrior of Varr'oza
body:
**Before you read this** I just want to say that I will be making more and I am up to suggestions. I will also redo the 2 champion concepts that I did on my other account (Danielw258... I was 10 shut up) onto this account, buffing/nerfing them and changing some abilities to make them better for the game right now. I hope to make many champion concepts cause it's pretty fun and I sorta want to join Riot and make some champions for League but I know that won't happen. As I said I will take suggestions to change the characters a bit if I think they're good. Aight you can read now. <3 xD

_**Ziba, the Last Warrior of Varr'oza**_
Ziba is a fighter who lacks mobility but has extremely high defense. He relies on having bonus health in order to gain damage. He would be best in the jungle or top lane. If Ziba gets caught out on his own, due to his low mobility, there isn't much he can do. 

_**Lore:** _
Hidden in the Kumungu jungle was the village of Varr'oza. The warriors of the village pride themselves in defensive combat. They learn much about being resilient in every fight and to never give up, no matter how hard the fight. 
One day, a sorceress covered in plants arrived, she had a dark smile on her face as she slowly walked through the village. The warriors of the village were unprepared for the violent growth of all plant life in the village. The warriors readied their weapons and tried to cut the plants down, with no success. Vines shot up from the ground, skewering people everywhere. The leader of the clan, Ziba, decided to go against all he had learned of never giving up. Instead of dying, he ran so he could seek vengeance at a later time when he was more prepared. Rage unending, Ziba will seek out the plant sorceress until the day he dies.

_**Appearance: **_
Built like Trundle, frenzied because his village got slaughtered.

_**Stats:**_
610 Health (+65 per level)
325 Mana (+40 per level)
56 AD (+3.2 per level)
0 AP (as usual)
27 Armor (+3.5 per level)
32 Magic Resist (+ 1.25 per level)
335 Movement Speed
0.658 Attack Speed (+2.5% per level)

_**Abilities: **_
_**Passive - Defensive Targeting:**_ 
Ziba randomly marks an enemy every 6 seconds (prioritising champions). When he damages a marked enemy, he gains **10/12.5/15/17.5/20/22.5/25** (at levels 1/3/6/9/12/15/18) armor and magic resist for 3 seconds.

_**Q - Varr'oza Punch:**_ 
Sprint to a target enemy, striking them and dealing **60/85/110/135/160 (+10% Ziba’s max hp)**, stunning them for **0.5/0.75/1/1.25/1.5** seconds (applies on hit effects).
**Mana: 60/65/70/75/80 
Cooldown: 12/11/10/9/8**

_**W - Resilience:**_ 
Ziba channels for **1/1.5/2/2.5/3** seconds, while channeling Ziba takes **5%/10%/15%/20%/25%** reduced damage. After the channel ends Ziba gains a shield lasting 4 seconds equal to **80/100/120/140/160 (+10%/15%/20%/25%/30%)** of damage taken during the channel. Ziba cannot attack or use abilities during the channel. Ziba may end the channel early. (Cooldown starts when the channel ends)
**Mana: 80 at all ranks.
Cooldown: 16/15/14/13/12**

_**E - Strength of the Varr'oza:**_ 
Toggle to increase max health by **50/90/130/170/210 (+40% Total AD)**. 
_**E passive:**_ 
Attack damage is increased by **5%** of bonus health. 
Strength of the Varr’oza does not stack with itself. Any health gained from this active (with the exception of health regeneration) is removed upon ending the toggle. Ziba cannot be reduced below 15% health by untoggling this ability
**Drains 8/9/10/11/12 mana per second. 
Cooldown: 2.5**

_**R - Volly of Fists:** _
Ziba unleashes a series of punches on an enemy champion for **2/3/4** seconds dealing **100/150/200 (+5% max hp)** physical damage per hit (0.5 seconds per tick), if the enemy moves out of the range (200), Ziba stops punching. Can move while active. 
**Mana: 100 at all ranks.
Cooldown: 90/80/70**

Dam ur good. They plant sorceress reminds me of zyra.{{champion:143}}

Thanks. I looked up the lore from the Kumungu jungle in Runeterra and found out that Zyra killed like everything that was there so I was like yeah that'd be cool to put it in the lore but I didn't want to put her name in it cause it's from Ziba's perspective and he didn't know her name. C;
